title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the core CLI and server to pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps Ollama’s REST API for easy integration into Python scripts and notebooks.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers to interact with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a first-class LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) that turns any Ollama instance into a ChatGPT-like interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing type-safe wrappers and reactive streams for Ollama’s API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or plain Ruby apps with idiomatic callbacks.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Community Go CLI that adds interactive chat, conversation history, and prompt templates on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local LLM code completion and chat via Ollama into the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for C# with async streams and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up ephemeral Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling options.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui-lite
summary: Lightweight React chatbot UI that can be statically hosted and connects to any remote Ollama server.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/tokio bindings for the Ollama REST API with serde-powered type safety.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets users query local Ollama models from within notes for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Curated npm search results showing 40+ community packages including ollama-js, ollama-node, ollama-ai, etc.

title: ollama PyPI search
summary: PyPI listing of Python packages: official ollama, langchain-ollama, ollama-async, ollama-chat, etc.

title: r/ollama subreddit
summary: Active Reddit community sharing model recommendations, troubleshooting, integrations, and feature requests.

title: ollama discourse models thread
summary: GitHub Discussions section where users request new models, share Modelfiles, and optimize quantization settings.
